name: antrashare
description: This is the project for Angular Batch training

scripts.start: concurrently "cd Antrashare_ui && ng serve" "cd Antrashare_server && node app.js"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd Antrashare_ui && npm install" "cd Antrashare_server && npm install"

author: JR Zhang, Daivd Dong
